summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganKnours. Soothing Essence Foam Toner tones and preps the skin while helping to unclog pores and shed dead skin cells. It features centella asiatica, sea buckthorn, and natural fruit extracts with antioxidant skin conditioning benefits that result in a smooth canvas for the next skincare steps.
details: DetailsBenefitsEasy to apply as an essence or to wipe away impurities after cleansingUnique foam formula absorbs quickly into skinTones and preps for the next skincare stepsSmoothes and restores skin surface for even skin tone and textureFormula is non-toxicKey IngredientsCentella Asiatica to hydrate and soothe skinSea Buckthorn to help repair skinFruit Extracts to moisturize and deliver antioxidantsItem 2636142How To UsePump an appropriate amount onto a cotton pad or directly onto the skin and wipe gently along the skin in upwards motions. Tap lightly to fully absorb.Precautions: For external use only. Do not swallow. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsWater, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Propanediol, Decyl Glucoside, Betaine, Polyglyceryl-100 Laurate, Xanthan Gum, Crataegus Cuneata Fruit Extract Disodium EDTA, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Citric Acid, Ceramide NP, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Peucedanum Graveolens (Dill) Extract, Eruca Sativa Leaf Extract.
how_to_use: Pump an appropriate amount onto a cotton pad or directly onto the skin and wipe gently along the skin in upwards motions. Tap lightly to fully absorb.Precautions: For external use only. Do not swallow. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.
ingredients: Crataegus Cuneata Fruit Extract Disodium EDTA
